item.description:
We're back in June for another of our famous Cashflow Meetups! ANY EXPERIENCE LEVEL IS WELCOME!! We always have some who have never played before as well as veterans. We will shoot for having a 202 board, but as always we reserve that board for those who have gotten out of the Rat Race at least five times.

If you have any trouble finding us, please feel free to call my cell (617-519-3163).

We're looking forward to seeing you ALL there on Sunday June 21!

Russ
617-519-3163
item.name: REGULAR Cashflow Meetup
